ygData.subject: Re: Isn't this a monk mailing list?
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, i made a ton of money this way with my level 7 bard making trips to unrest to get fs weapons and stuff.  speed song was very big in making this
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, i made a ton of money this way with my level 7 bard making trips to
unrest to get fs weapons and stuff. speed song was very big in making
this worthwhile. now tho, it's easier to kill stuff and get the fs to
sell, heh.

At 03:44 PM 9/20/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...>
>
>> P.S. 500p is a reasonable amount to have SAVED up by level 18, but making
>> 500p IN ONE DAY at level 19 is amazing, he may not wnat to give away his
>> secret, but what ever he is doing to make that kind of money I would like
>> to know...
>
>its no secret. verant had created a rather true economy. instead of
>practicing my skills in pottery, I've practiced it in commerce.
>
>Capitolism is alive and well on the servers.
>
>granted, I had a great day yesterday, and my initial investment certanly
>needed to be taken out of the 500pp I made. and I sold stuff that I have
>had sitting in inventory for a while.
>
>just another example of another way to play the game (that I'm sure some
>poeple will tell me I'm wrong for)
>
>*monk specific part*
>I find that monks make good traders. When I'm traveling, I dont worry
>about the weight restrictions, and I usually dont fight, just feign. Gets
>me where I want to go.
>
>
>>
